snippet: The bill was relegated to the Senate’s to-do list for September, reflecting a pattern of delays since the Republicans took control this year.
abstract: Senate enters its August recess period without voting on cybersecurity bill; measure joins several others on fall to-do list, including votes on Iran nuclear deal and Republican push to defund Planned Parenthood.
lead_paragraph: The bill was relegated to the Senate’s to-do list for September, reflecting a pattern of delays since the Republicans took control this year.

headline.main: Cybersecurity Bill Is Latest to Be Delayed in Senate
headline.print_headline: Cybersecurity Bill Is Latest to Be Delayed in Senate
